paye.description: PAYE income details per employment for an individual for the requested time period.

taxYear.description: The tax year in the format YY-YY.

hasPartner.description: States if the employee has a partner.

payFrequency.description: The frequency of payments. W1 Weekly, W2 Fortnightly, W4 Four weekly, M1 Monthly, M3 Quarterly, M6 Bi-annually, MA Annually, IO One off, IR Irregular.

weeklyPeriodNumber.description: The number corresponding to the week the payment was made. As pay dates may not align with calendar weeks, the range of permitted values is 1 through to 54 (inclusive), and 56.

monthlyPeriodNumber.description: The number between 1 and 12, corresponding to the month the payment was made. As the tax year starts in April, so does the monthPayNumber, with 1 corresponding to April.

taxCode.description: The tax code associated with the payment.

taxablePayToDate.description: The taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits to date. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

taxablePay.description: Taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits in kind. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

totalTaxToDate.description: The total tax to date in this employment. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

taxDeductedOrRefunded.description: The value of tax deducted or refunded from this payment. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

employeePensionContribs.description: Details about the employee's pension contributions.

paidYTD.description: The value of employee pension contributions to date. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

notPaidYTD.description: The value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

paid.description: The value of the employee pension contributions paid under net pay arrangements in the pay period. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

notPaid.description: The value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

dednsFromNetPay.description: The value of deductions from net pay in the pay period. Amount in the range of: -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

statutoryPayYTD.description: Details about statutory pay for the year to date.

maternity.description: The value for maternity pay. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

paternity.description: Value for paternity pay. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

adoption.description: The value for adoption pay. Amount the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

parentalBereavement.description: The value for parental bereavement pay. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

grossEarningsForNICs.description: Details about gross earnings for National Insurance contributions.

inPayPeriod1.description: The value in pay period 1. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod2.description: The value in pay period 2. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod3.description: The value in pay period 3. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod4.description: The value in pay period 4. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

id.description: An identifier assigned by the employer to the individual.

paidHoursWorked.description: The number of normal hours worked.

totalEmployerNICs.description: Details about the employer's total National Insurance contributions.

inPayPeriod1.description: The value in pay period 1. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod2.description: The value in pay period 2. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod3.description: The value in pay period 3. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod4.description: The value in pay period 4. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd1.description: The value year to date 1. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd2.description: The value year to date 2. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd3.description: The value year to date 3. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd4.description: The value year to date 4. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

employeeNICs.description: Details about the employee's National Insurance contributions due on all earnings.

inPayPeriod1.description: The value in pay period 1. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod2.description: The value in pay period 2. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod3.description: The value in pay period 3. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

inPayPeriod4.description: The value in pay period 4. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd1.description: The value year to date 1. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd2.description: The value year to date 2. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd3.description: The value year to date 3. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.

ytd4.description: The value year to date 3. Amount in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99.
